attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown was not elected to be our PM
He has squandered the assets of our country - eg gold reserves
He has presided over a corrupt Parliament.
now he proposes the traitor (US puppet BLair) as President of Europe
This is a man without talent, without honour and who's only ambition is to hold onto power for selfish personal gain.
He has no interest to advance this grat nation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
